@bmaz @GenMhayden I agree. You've never--even in hurling obscenities at us :)--engaged in that particular misunderstanding of our work.
@bmaz @GenMhayden conversions. our point is that we're all in the boat as expressions of the same value systems that we started with.
@bmaz @GenMhayden I fully agree with that. But a lot of people have assumed that we're in the same boat because we've had death-bed
@bmaz @GenMhayden our posture. We felt a word of explanation was in order.
@bmaz @GenMhayden agreed. It's just that the magnification of the duty has put us in a position in which a lot of people are surprised by
@bmaz @GenMhayden As you know, I am not spending my time taking shots at civil libertarians these days.
@bmaz @GenMhayden I hope it doesn't come across that way to others, but if it does, for my part, that's certainly not what I intended.
@bmaz @GenMhayden the costs to effectiveness, that is.
@bmaz @GenMhayden ...effective outcomes than if you believe it's an apparatus that doesn't produce effective CT at all.
@bmaz @GenMhayden decisionmaking is necessarily higher if you believe those systems have a lot of integrity and tend to produce...
@bmaz @GenMhayden our point is just that the costs of the war Trump is waging on the apparatus of intelligence and national security...
@bmaz @GenMhayden Gosh, it really wasn't meant as a shot at civ libs at all and I'm terribly sorry if it came off that way!

@JasonLeopold right to do it, and I'm actually not afraid of embarrassment of anything in those emails. But I do resent it.
@JasonLeopold I am not without resentment of even lawful inquiries into the relationships we have sought to build. I don't question your
@JasonLeopold are inseparable from the trust we developed. And just as you likely resent lawful leak investigations to get at your sources,
@JasonLeopold find that our intimacy with the deep state gives us credibility. I just want people to understand that those relationships
@JasonLeopold People who were offended by our refusal to publish classified leaks--a policy essential to our credibility within the IC--now
@JasonLeopold people who accused us of being toadies for @NSA mysteriously find that @Susan_Hennessey's voice is really valuable. ...
@JasonLeopold ...relations with the bureaucracy that we have now. A lot of people are seeing the benefits of those relationships now, ...
